Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: removed the entire folder from komodo in app data for eql, tried again same issue

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: EQL experiencing now problems with Electrum servers so Lite mode for EQL will not work correct

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: üòÆ what do i do now?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: You can use native mode for EQL

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: but but my balance is on the eql lite (kmd address)

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: how do i send balance to the native address?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
You can import your privkey from lite mode to native one:
1) Export your WIF key from SPV/Lite mode: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000024493-how-to-use-agama-lite-mode-and-export-wifkey
2) Import your key in native mode: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000024488-import-private-key-in-agama-native-mode

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: okay lemme give it a try @TonyL

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: thank for your help

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: You're most welcome! Feel free to ask if you'll face problem on some step

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: won't the wif key be same for eql if i used the kmd address? i mean wif key of kmd will be of eql too right?

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: i mean i use the kmd address for nearly every assetchain of kmd

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Yes wif would be the same

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: awesome

Author: Catalyst#8405
Content: thanks

Until then using native is pretty simple if you already have loaded all of the blocks.

Content:
Hello all, do you have any resource to share regaring how to build sidechain in KMD plarfrom ?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
Hello @{RSM} Skywall ! You can find how-to guide for asset-chain creating here: https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/create-Komodo-Assetchain.html?highlight=assetchain
Also here is asset chain parameters description: https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/assetchain-params.html
And some examples: https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/example-asset-chains.html

Content: And doc if kick-start help with Linux needed: https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/beginner-vps-linux-assetchain.html
